Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Dear hubballi,  That a really great questions, to make sure there are no defaults or lenders are secured there are three things we are doing is, on the consumer product people can create their own group and save collectively, and people will initially only invite someone who trust so that there are lesser number of default. On the Business to Business/enterprise product, manufacturing companies will initiate and invite collaborative savings for their distributors, this will give distributors opportunity to buy products from manufacturer and provide a way for interest free credit for longer period without exposing the credit risk to the manufacturing company. And in the business to business model manufacturing company bear the loss of in case of any distributor defaults, but this wont effect manufacturing companies at all, as per our market research and statistical analysis the defaults wont be more than ~.1% of sales boots.  Thanks, GetUnion Team

Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥

Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Dear Annieluvyou,  Thanks for your feedback and we do agree that there have been few lending platforms that have emerged, we have below differentiated competitive advantage with respect to our competition:  Improved and strict KYC Targeting Indian market ~400 million millennial population, lot of local market research has been done, and product is highly personalised Also on the above point, our smart contracts will be jurisdiction specific, and lot of research and development is going into that, so that both the parties are secured There will be a B2B product under Union's portfolio for distribution heavy business, which we have never seen in the past Customer centric, we are keeping our customer in the centre and developing products around them   These are just few points, we are a team of driven individuals, who are determined to server our customers better, and help them to leverage the power blockchain. Also, if you have any suggestions, we would love to hear them, its posts and comments like this that also helps us improve and think harder.  Thanks, GetUnion Team

Author: Mocoinaire
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Will there be a limitation on the amount an individual can borrow or I can borrow as much as I want?

Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Union will not acts as a lender but will provide a platform where people can save in community, one of our product is UnI Pool. Below is how it works.  "Adam wants to furnish his house, but he is short of cash. In Union platform with UnI Pool, he can invite people he knows to help him save up. Adam will create a saving pool, he will set the rules and length of time, people can accept and join. Adam then starts the saving pool. People contribute money according to the rules Adam has set. At the end of each contribution round, the money pooled gets distributed to a single person in the saving pool. In some pool, people can bid to win the pool. In others, the pool gets distributed to people according to a set schedule. Adam can now afford to furnish his house. People in the circle have more money to spend, too.  After the saving pool ends, Adam (or anyone) can start another to continue to save and lend with others."  Hope it solves your queries. Let us know if you have further questions!  Thanks, GetUnion Team

Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Thanks pwanjain for your feedback, we will employ a combination of our own developed algorithm, with some of the commercially available licensed technology solutions to detect and prevent fraud when it comes to lending. As we grow we will collect the transaction history and past dataset and uses techniques such as knowledge based authentication (KBA), and also behavioral analytics.  Having said that we are just providing the platform to facilitate collaborative saving. On the consumer product people can create their own group and save collectively, and people will initially only invite someone who trust so that there are lesser number of default. On the Business to Business/enterprise product, manufacturing companies will initiate and invite collaborative savings for their distributors, this will give distributors opportunity to buy products from manufacturer and provide a way for interest free credit for longer period without exposing the credit risk to the manufacturing company.  Thanks, GetUnion Team

Author: warningsigns
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Why can't you source money from traditional banks or local investors? Sourcing funds by selling tokens is very risky. There have been a series of scams in the past which were extremely sophisticated and elaborate in their sales approach. What's scary and concerning is that some of them did manage to rake in tens of millions of USD before the people behind those token projects disappeared in thin air.  What assurances and guarantees can you provide to your target investors? Whitepapers and roadmaps are not sufficient indicators of credibility. Creating them takes minimal effort when team effort is involved. Sophisticated minds can create these token projects if there are adequate financial incentives in sight. Scammers do brainstorm and some of them are really good at it if they know there is something to be gained from it.

Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Dear warningsigns,  Thanks for your comments, these are exactly the questions people would be asking. Please find our comments below in italics:  Why can't you source money from traditional banks or local investors? [Getunion] Sourcing money from the traditional banks will be debt on our books, and paying EMI will take funds out of a growing startup, which will hinder our growth. Hence we are not talking traditional approach.  Sourcing funds by selling tokens is very risky. There have been a series of scams in the past which were extremely sophisticated and elaborate in their sales approach. What's scary and concerning is that some of them did manage to rake in tens of millions of USD before the people behind those token projects disappeared in thin air. [Getunion] Agreed, there have been lot of scams in the past, which have exploited crowdsale, and that is reason we are were transparent and open in all our activities.    What assurances and guarantees can you provide to your target investors? Whitepapers and roadmaps are not sufficient indicators of credibility. Creating them takes minimal effort when team effort is involved. Sophisticated minds can create these token projects if there are adequate financial incentives in sight. Scammers do brainstorm and some of them are really good at it if they know there is something to be gained from it. [Getunion] We cannot assure any guaranteed return (no one can), but what we can assure is that we are working round to clock to make this project success. If you do manage to check our profiles, we are a team from highly reputed colleges in India (NITs, IITs, and IIMs), having worked overseas and in India. We have quit our jobs to fully dedicate ourselves on this project. We do understand that people invests their hard earned money on ICOs, and that the reason we are more determined to face any challenges. Also we are targeting ~400 Million millennia India population, who are in desparate need of a product we are coming up with, there's lot of market research gone into this.  We hope that all your queries have been answered, but please feel free to reach out to us. Its posts like this that creates a trust and asks questions which people generally shy away from.  Thanks GetUnion Team

Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Normally its A Collective Investment scheme, where in a group of persons enter into an agreement that each individual will contribute a fixed sum regularly for a specified period of time in order to borrow and save money together. This scheme has been a trusted format to support oneself in times of need, it helps as a borrowing and savings instrument, rate of borrowing is determined by the participants themselves, the intermediaries cost is lower when compared to traditional banking, and it uses social capital.  The modus operandi of scheme is simple: Let us assume a collective fund has 4 members, who put in INR 1,000 a month each. This would mean that a collection of INR 4,000 would be made. Thereafter, an auction is conducted where the lowest bid (from a person who is most in need of money that month) is selected. Assuming that the lowest bid is INR 3,800, the balance amount of INR 200 will be equally divided among the other members. This process will continue for 4 months, going by the number of people in the group.  There are a lot of different forms of collective investment scheme used by people all over the world. Majorities of these informal collective investment schemes are based on individual choices. Nevertheless, there are as well broadly distributed mechanisms to save and borrow together or in groups. Informal collective investments groups have long existed in different parts of the world, including, Europe, Africa, America, Asia. In Latin America and Caribbean, these have existed for decades, giving rise to a broad array of methodologies and approaches of different scope and success.

Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥

Author: Wilsonthebitcoiner
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: https://i.imgur.com/8PnGheG.png  ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ Introducing Union  Union will serve as a platform to provide financial product based on social capital, trust and commitments. It will run on Ethereum blockchain technology to provide autonomous smart contract, which will ease the lending, and savings process without the intermediaries. We are providing platform for users to build social trust and capital with UnI Pool, our first product, then measure social capital using our second product (Union lending Authentication), and then finally using social capital to borrow money and part of this could be UnI Pool/ROSCA and Bill Discounting.  ▄▄▄▄ About Union  https://i.imgur.com/25fX4cU.png https://i.imgur.com/qDmBrUL.png  ▄▄ Our Vision  Our vision is to create an e-democratic financial ecosystem for banked and unbanked individuals, on blockchain technology while making use of trusts, commitments, and social capital. By social capital, we mean we’ll leverage a form of economic and cultural capital where social networks are key; transaction processes are reciprocal, based on trust, and cooperation; and market agents create goods and services. Social capital is an economic scheme that leverages the economic value of the connections between individuals and organizations. The social network itself, which includes individuals who trust and assist each other, can be an influential asset.   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ Market  India is one of the fastest growing Internet regions. With 400 million Internet users, it is 2nd largest Internet market in the world. India also has the largest millennial population in the world, driving the country’s mobile economic revolution. By 2025 millennial population is expected to be 42% of total India’s population, providing opportunities to server them better with technology innovation. [Morgan Stanley]  Creating an ecosystem of financial products with “Collective Investment Schemes” on blockchain technology to make the lending and savings frictionless, by removing the inefficiencies current financial system, and marketing those products to 400 Million internet users will be a real game changer.   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ Meet Our Team  Team is always the critical factor for success of any project and our team members, supported by experienced advisors, are determined to develop the UNION platform to serve its users and help them save money. Meet our team and explore their Linkedin profiles here.   ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ ICO Structure  https://i.imgur.com/Mwng1l5.png https://i.imgur.com/G3QEDcy.png  ▄▄▄▄ Bonus Structure  https://i.imgur.com/JRrRp7r.png  ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ https://i.imgur.com/fFQyVLj.png https://i.imgur.com/M7N5YL5.png https://i.imgur.com/jEbP7xG.png https://i.imgur.com/e9VlzeF.png  ▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ https://i.imgur.com/oAEIRMz.png   EXPLORE OUR PROJECT WWW.GETUNION.IO JOIN OUR TELEGRAM COMMUNITY DOWNLOAD OUR WHITEPAPER FOLLOW US ON TWITTER VIEW OUR EMPLOYEES PROFILES ON LINKELDIN

Author: cryptowritedu
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: I need a loan with you. whats the procedure?

Author: getunion
Title: 🔥🔥[ANN] [UNI] Union | Ecosystem for collaborative savings on blockchain🔥🔥
Body: Dear cryptowritedu, our services doesnt allow loaning directly to a consumer. We are connecting lenders and borrowers in a unified frictionless environment. Our first product is UnI Pool, where you can create a collective investment scheme with your trusted friends, and get loan from them, and make a regular payment without interest. Do read more about our offerings in our WHITEPAPER.  Let us know if you have more questions.  Union Team
